nodes.text: Telosians were the inhabitants of the Outer Rim world of Telos IV.
In the year 3958 BBY, Admiral Saul Karath betrayed the Republic and bombarded the surface of Telos IV, killing a majority of the Telosians on the surface, including the wife of Carth Onasi.

After the end of the Jedi Civil War, the Telosian Restoration Project focused on restoring the devastated surface of Telos, and making it habitable again. At that point, the Telosions lived on the massive Citadel Station in orbit around the planet.
At some point, the surface was habitable again, and cities developed on the surface, including the capital city of Thani.
